about_the_game:
The background of the story is set in a fictional post-apocalyptic Western Europe. Players will enter multiple areas to search for necessary equipment. An abandoned shelter that serves as a base of operations, facilities such as merchants, modding workstations, and personal customization areas will show players' progress in this brutal adventure.

However, once you step out of the shelter and enter the desolate world of ruins, the situation becomes extremely dangerous. The game contains a variety of different areas, each filled with dangerous biomes. Players will be given initial equipment, and then must rely on themselves to find supplies, fight bandits, and most importantly, return to the shelter alive.

It should be noted that nuclear radiation may have an impact on local zombies, enemies, and wild animals, making them more ferocious and threatening...

Explore


Through observation, experimentation, and repeated exploration, you will gradually understand the characteristics and mechanics of the map. But proceed with caution to ensure a safe return. Each adventure will bring a different reward, which may be treasure, a new path or a hidden story clue. Get ready for the challenge, because the wasteland never stops surprising, and your bravery and curiosity will lead you to discover each map's unique secrets and treasures.

Task

In the game, you will embark on a journey through time, with multiple quest lines guiding you forward. Through conversations with various characters, you will gradually obtain information and uncover the secrets of this world. Each adventure will bring different accessories and rewards, allowing you to continuously improve your strength and resources. In the process of slowly unraveling the mystery, you will continue to discover new secrets and challenges, maintain curiosity and courage, and move forward for the truth of this world.

Death


In this harsh apocalyptic world, preserving life is the most important thing. Once the character dies, all accumulated equipment and resources will be lost. After all, only by living can we start over and look for a better tomorrow. Persisting in survival is the key to this cruel game.

Battle


There are still zombies roaming the streets in this world, and they may attack you at any time, so you must not take it lightly. But don't lose heart! When you have enough ammunition, why not take on a thrilling house cleaning challenge? Use heavy firearms to fire wildly and let the powerful shock destroy all enemies. Imagine that you are standing in front of mountains of corpses, spraying bullets like fireworks, knocking down the zombies mercilessly, and the messy battlefield becomes proof of your victory! Stay vigilant, stay alive, and then use your power to create a safer tomorrow!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent, integrated graphics not supported
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended, 32-bit Supported

short_description: This game is set in a fictional post-apocalyptic Western Europe. They must use their wits and skills to survive in dangerous environments. On the road of adventure, players will encounter thrilling moments and feel an unparalleled tension and sense of accomplishment.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
